headline: How Analyst Price Targets Are Rewriting The Story For Palo Alto Networks (PANW)
summary: Palo Alto Networks stock is back in focus as analysts update their price targets, reflecting a fresh read on the company’s risk and reward profile. This article walks through what has changed in that target and how recent commentary is reshaping the story around the shares. Stay tuned to see how you can keep on top of these narrative shifts before they influence your own view of the stock.
